column1: full on middle stump, flicked into the leg side
length at middle, poked into the leg side off the back foot
full on middle stump, driven to long-on with the angle
yorker length at middle stump, backs away to open up the off side. Jams it to mid-on
length on off stump, poked into the covers with soft hands
taken at short third! Matt Renshaw with his first wicket in T20s! Short and sliding in from around the wicket. Just outside off. He's hurried on the cut and get a thick edge that carries to Lynn
attempted slower ball, good length and down leg side
short of a length just outside off, cut to deep backward point

straight to deep backward point! That's taken some precision. First ball for Lehmann. Short and just outside off. Lines up to cut and doesn't try to keep it down. Ross runs in and takes a simple one. Third man was in, there was plenty to aim at square of the wicket, but he finds that man
length on off stump, looks to flick, gets an inside edge onto front pad
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length outside off, punched to sweeper point off the back foot
length and just outside off, tapped to cover on the up
full on off stump, hurriedly driven to mid-off
short of a length and in at off stump. Backs away and cuts to point
length ball fired down leg. Looks to sweep, cops it on the front pad. Trickles fine of short fine
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket off the inside half
stands his ground and pumps this over the long-off boundary. Simple. Ingram tries the radical idea of staying still. He gets one in his zone and creams it on the half-volley
over midwicket. Flat full toss on leg stump. Stays tall again and slugs this over the boundary
length at off stump, punched to cover off the back foot
short and just outside off. Mistimed pull straight to short fine after he shuffles
short outside off. Early into the cut. Under-edged into the point region
slower ball at a length on off stump. Adjusts after shaping to punch. Runs it out to deep point
slower short ball at off stump. Looks to pull and is done by the variation. Ends up dragging off the toe to deep square's right. He dives and stops on the bounce
length on off stump, punched straight to cover point
short of a length just outside off, cut straight to point
length on middle stump, backs away and launches this on the up, straight over the bowler
full outside off, gets down at it and sweeps firmly, and aerially to midwicket's right. No getting to that
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
overpitched just outside off. Gets the front leg into the leg side and carves this with the angle to the cover boundary
length on leg stump, dabbed into the midwicket region off the front foot
full and very wide outside off. Can't reach that
short outside off, sliced to deep point
slower ball, short and wide outside off. Shuffles and chops to sweeper point
low full toss just outside off, whipped to mid-off off the toe-end
length and wide outside off. Reaches out and feels for it. It comes on nicely and he slaps on the up between extra cover and mid-off
straight to cover. Overpitched just outside off. Makes room and wants to carve behind square, but it's low and to Swepson's right and he hangs on
short of a length cutter on leg. Gently nudged through square leg off the back foot
short and just outside off. Mistimed cut to extra cover's left
short at middle stump, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
length at middle stump. Whipped across the turn into the midwicket region
googly, short of a length on off stump. Punched to long-off off the back foot
short and just outside off. Cut to sweeper's left
short outside off, chopped to sweeper cover
short and down leg side. Looks to pull. Tucked up by the pace. Top edge to fine leg's right
overpitched on middle stump, punched to mid-off on the front foot
short and wide outside off, gets quickly onto the back foot to transfer his weight and then he pumps this over midwicket. Superb connection
slower ball at a length on off stump. Dropped to cover's right with soft hands
short and just outside off. Looks to cut, beaten on the outside edge. Too close for that shot
length and in at leg stump. Looks to play the flick. Cops it on the thigh
full on off stump, gets the front leg out and tries to jam it through cover. Rolls back down the pitch
short and wide outside off, cuts to sweeper cover
short of a length and turning in at off stump. Punched to long-on with the turn
short and just outside off. Late cut to point's right, but his dive to the right saves two. Sweeper cleans up
full outside off, looks to slug into the leg side, gets an inside edge past short fine
short and just outside off. Cut to sweeper cover
slower ball at a length, just outside off. Tapped to point off the back foot
length at leg stump. Looks to flick and cops this on the thigh as well
slower ball, short of a length outside off. Looks to cut, beaten on the outside edge
overpitched just outside off, driven straight to extra cover
length at middle stump, gets on top of the bounce and drops this into the midwicket region
slower ball, short of a length just outside off. Cut to deep point
full outside off, flicked to deep midwicket off the back foot
length on leg stump, steps out and flicks to short fine's left
low full toss just outside off. Reverse whip, can't beat short third to the left
length ball lobbed up wide outside off. Cut to sweeper cover
length ball wide outside off. Looks to sweep, beaten. Big, solitary appeal from the keeper. Turned down
length and across the corridor. Looks to flick. Closes the face too early. Leading edge short of extra cover
short of a length just outside off, sliced straight to point
full on leg stump, leans in and clips it to long-on's right. Quick call to complete the second
slower ball, overpitched outside off. Sets up beautifully with a crouch and springs into this on the front foot. Inside-out and over the wide long-off boundary
short at leg stump. Gets on top of the bounce and hooks into the turf towards fine leg
full ball outside off. Shuffles, gets behind the line and wants to whip this. But his weight is not moving into the ball and he ends up lofting it gently for McCullum at deep midwicket
short of a length on leg stump, dropped into the square leg region off the back foot
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
googly, at a length and wide outside off. Beaten in flight as he steps out. Goes across the line. Leading edge flies high and wide of first slip
length and slow outside off. Swats along the ground to deep midwicket
length on leg stump, flicked straight to midwicket
lobbed up slowly outside off. Steps out, meets on the full, flicks to long-on
through him! Short and sliding onto leg stump. Backs away and tries to cut. Beaten on the under-edge . Was certainly expecting that to turn, but it didn't. Tonks leg stump
short of a length just outside off. Opens the face and pokes it to point...who runs in and misfields
low full toss just outside off, tapped back to the bowler on the bounce
short of a length outside, beaten on the cut
short and skidding quickly in the corridor. Beaten on the cut again
short and climbing up in the corridor. Backs away and swishes from under it. Beaten on the attempted late cut
length and in at leg stump. Drops it to midwicket's right. He over-runs it and allows a second as he misses that
short at off stump. Turns very early for reverse sweep. The length allows him to hold his shape. Swats it through point and finds the boundary
googly at a length outside off, steps out and whips to deep midwicket
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
full on off stump, steps out and drives against the turn to long-off

fantastic from Baz at the boundary! But he just about loses the battle. Length on off stump, looks for the slog sweep and and loses his footing. Ends up slicing it. It's just about climbing over the boundary as McCullum plucks it. He's about to fall over, so he whips it back forcefully for long-on who is quite a way away. That fielder runs in and puts in a slide low to take it. But McCullum has stepped on the rope. What an effort. How old is he again? Looks like it was Cutting coming in from long-on
length at middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
full and wide outside off, can't connect on the drive
length on off stump, punched down the pitch
short and wide outside off, cut hard to sweeper cover and...you wouldn't believe this...McCullum lets it through from under his legs.
slower short ball outside off. Waits on it and cuts from underneath. Thick outside edge past the keeper
taken low by Ross! Short ball just outside off. Pulls from under it, slices towards deep square. It's dipping down on him as he sprints into the sun. But he slides in perfectly to hold on
length on off stump, backs away and punches to mid-off
slower ball at a length outside off. Flicks aerially to deep midwicket
bouncer outside off. Walks down at it and it gets too big on him. So he gets his head away, closes his eyes and keeps the bat face pointing upwards. It hits and climbs over the keeper

slower ball at a length, wide outside off. Lines up and scythes hard at this with an open face. Rolls rapidly to the sweeper's left but Ross sprints and gets down with agility to pull this back with his left hand
short and just outside off, cut to sweeper cover's right
full and wide outside off. Reaches out and looks to slash it behind point. Beaten. Big appeal from Cutting. Umpire waits for him to be done and calls wide
full and wide outside off. Chops at it, gets a thick outside edge past the keeper and short third
another outside edge. Slower ball, at a length outside off. He lines up and looks to carve it over extra cover. Thick outside edge floats wide of the diving keeper
low full toss on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket's left
short and wide outside off. Gets on the back foot, moves his weight into this and cuts from underneath to clear the point boundary! Stunning
slower ball at a length on off stump. Looks to punch straight on the up but the variation has got the better of him. Lifts it high and long-on gets under it to complete the catch to his left
low yorker outside off, flicked to deep square
slower ball, full outside off. Chopped to point with an open face
full outside off, steps across and drives to sweeper's right
slower ball at a length, wide outside off. Left alone

low full toss outside off. Hammers it with a closed face, to long-on's right. A direct hit from there and the batsmen are now confused about pinching an overthrow on the off side. Nearly ended up at the same end, both of them. In the end the throw is wide for the keeper and Valente dives to get in at the other end as the relay throw comes
length at off stump, steps out and punches it with an angled bat. Past the non-striker with some force. Long-off is wide and his dive to the left won't get him to this
length on leg stump, whipped to deep square

length and wide outside off. Heaves at it, looks to go leg side. Gets a thick edge that flies over short third and beats deep point to his left. Cutting can't believe it, another outside edge off his bowling goes for four
low full toss outside off, lines up with a slight shuffles and drills it past extra cover. Beats his dive and sweeper is running gingerly to his right and lets this slide away

slower length ball at leg stump. Gets the front foot away and looks to slog over midwicket. Gets it off the toe-end and it's dragged towards deep square who settles under it with a reverse cup and holds on
slower short ball outside off. Looks to pull, forced to adjust with the change in pace. Into the square leg region off the toe-end
stays leg side of this and carves it over the backward point boundary! Siddle like he's batting on 300. Short and wide outside off and he carves from underneath. No fielders deep there
slower short ball following him down leg side. Hooked to deep square's right
slower length ball down leg side. Left alone
full outside off. He backs away to make room, exposes his stumps, and chops down on this. Thick edge whistles past the keeper
slower short ball, way down leg side. Left alone
slower short ball at leg stump. Backs away and pulls it to long-on's right before coming back for a second
short and just outside off. Looks for the cut, gets it off the bottom edge and it races past short third
length outside off, mistimed punched to extra cover's left
short of a length just outside off, opens the face and runs it down to third man
length outside off, looks to slap it through cover. Gets an inside edge to short fine

bit of a mix-up between the fielders, but they sort it out and avoid a collision as Rashid holds on. Short ball at middle stump. Looks to pull and is too late on it. One hand comes off. This float high in the square leg region and Rashid pedals back from midwicket to hold on as deep square runs in towards it and withdraws late
length on off stump, defended into the covers off the back foot
length on middle stump, defended into the leg side
short of a length on middle stump. Backs away, exposes the stumps, slashes at it. Wants to go off side clearly, but he gets a thick edge. Carey leaps to his right and grabs this
length at off stump, defended into the off side
length at leg stump, tapped to midwicket
slower ball, full on leg stump. Flicked to deep midwicket
short of a length outside off, cut to sweeper cover
short of a length outside off. Shuffles and looks to pull. It trickles to the keeper off the toe end
yorker down leg side, beaten on the flick
length outside off, gets up with the bounce and chops it over cover
full on off stump, driven to mid-off's left

length on leg stump. Looks to flick and is beaten on it. Big appeal and he is given! Looks like the batsman thought he was out because he appeared to be walking away. That might not have been too close though. Looked like would have gone down leg
length on middle stump, punched on the up to mid-on
length on off stump. Dropped into the off side with soft hands
full slower ball outside off. Looks to drive over cover and slices it high over mid-off
looks to go big in the off side again, gets a leading edge to sweeper cover
length outside off, stays big on it and slaps wide of mid-off
full slower ball on leg stump, poked wide of midwicket off the front foot
nails this one! Length ball, might have been a cutter. Just outside off. Big bat swing under it and towards the leg side. Clears the long-on boundary
short of a length on off stump, cut straight to point
length on off stump, gets on the back foot and flicks to square leg
length on off stump, tapped back to the bowler off the back foot
length outside off, looks for the reverse sweep and misses. Past slip off the back thigh
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
googly at a length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
sort of a length just outside off. Backs away and taps to point off the back foot
full slower ball on leg stump. Stands tall, tickles it fine and past the fielder in the infield
full and in at leg stump. Poked to long-on off the front foot
full at middle and off. Opens his stance, jumps into the leg side and slices this over point. No one deep on the off side
shot! Majestic from Renshaw. Short of a length ball on leg stump. He gets on the front foot and pulls this over deep square. Lovely balance and shape as he got under this
overpitched on leg stump and smashed! Renshaw gets the whip down on this and makes it fly wide of midwicket
full and wide outside off. Reaches out and taps this to sweeper's left
low full toss outside off, mistimed drive to mid-off's right
short ball at leg stump, hooks to deep square
yorker just outside off. Looks to slice it through point. Looks like he's got a bump ball to point off the toe-end, having met this on the full. The fielder appeals for it, as does Siddle. No chance.
low full toss outside off, leans in and nudges this wide of mid-off. Just has to beat the infield and that's four
full on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
slower ball, short of a length on leg stump. Whips to deep square's left
length outside off, driven on the up to sweeper cover
slower ball at a length just outside off. Dabs it to extra cover's left
shot! Length ball at middle stump. Gets the front leg across and ramps this over square leg
full and just outside off, driven off the toe-end to extra cover's right
length on off stump, pushed to long-off on the front foot
low full toss outside off, sliced to deep backward point
length on off stump, pushes on the front foot, gets a thick outside edge to short third
length on middle stump, swept to square leg
googly at middle stump, on a good length. Gets in position rapidly and lifts this reverse sweep through backward point
inside edge and past the keeper and off stump. Length outside off and he looks to drive through cover, against the turn. Short fine cleans up
length outside off stump, beaten on the front foot as he looks to jab at this
short of a length on off stump, dropped into the covers with soft hands

Run-out chance missed! Length ball following him down leg side. He wants to flick, it comes off his pad. Renshaw wants the run and McCullum sends him back. Keeper can't hit the stumps at the other end
short of a length at leg stump. Mistimed aerial pull to deep midwicket's right
length just outside off, driven to long-off's right and Baz calls confidently to steal the second as the throw comes in
length ball wide outside off. Chucks the bat at it and is beaten
length and wide outside off. Punched straight to extra cover and one again, he is sent back
blazes it past sweeper and brings up his first fifty in T20s! Overpitched just outside off, gets in a half stride and brings the axe down on this. Sweeper with no chance to his left
slower ball at a length, wide outside off. Reaches out and slices to sweeper's right
low full toss on leg stump. Looks to slog and drags it down to long-on. He thinks that's a no-ball. Didn't look like it at all. It was thigh high at best, and that was as McCullum squatted into it
length outside off, driven straight to extra cover
slower bounce outside off. Jumps into the off side and tries to ramp it over short fine. Beaten
full on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket's left
slower ball, full and wide outside off. Shuffles and swishes. Beaten on the sweep
past deep cover! Short and wide and he climbs into the cut. Dive to the right won't get the fielder there

oh superb! Serious skill-up from this guy, it appears. Length ball slanted outside off. Strides into the off side, a long way, and ramps it fine. There's no one behind square on the leg side. Great option
offcutter, short and wide outside off. Slashes and gets a thick outside edge between short third and point
length on middle stump, slogs off the inside half to deep square
falls short of deep midwicket. Slower length ball outside off. Shuffles and sets up for a massive slog sweep. It comes off the toe-end
length and wide outside off. Beaten on the outside edge as he throws his hands at this
yorker outside off, shuffles and is forced to jam into the off side
lovely floaty slower ball. Length outside off and drifts away from the outside edge
bouncer just outside off. Looks to hook and is really late on that. Beaten
full and just outside off. Drives firmly to long-off's right
slower yorker floating away from middle stump. Jammed into the midwicket region off the front foot
bam! Power from Renshaw. Length at middle stump, backs into the leg side and goes long-on. High and far over the ropes
length on leg stump, dropped into the leg side off the back foot
yorker just outside off. Shuffles and flicks at this. Gets it off the inside half to square leg. He fumbles and they sneak a second
yorker outside off. Jams it into the midwicket region

there we go! Vintage Baz. Full ball on off stump. Falls into the leg side, shaping for the ramp over fine leg. Then ends up flicking the wrists late to lift this over short third man. One bounce and four
length on middle stump, gets the front leg out of the way and drills it flat over Renshaw. Just clears the boundary
spanked away! Short of a length just outside off. Backs away to make more room and gets a flat bat out at this. Sweeper can barely see that to his right
yorker following him down leg side. Tickles it into the leg side and brings up fifty
short and down leg side. Pulled to deep square
googly, short of a length outside off. Cut to sweeper
slider at a length outside off, swept straight to short fine. Sent back and just gets the bat in as the keeper takes off the bails

given lbw! McCullum can't believe it. It looked to me like he was outside off when that hit him. Does he think there's bat on it? Length at off stump, it turns away as he gets down for the sweep and misses. Hits his back thigh. Might have been slightly outside. It was really close.
shot! Length at off stump, gets down and swats this well in front of deep midwicket and his dive won't get him to stop that
full on leg stump, swept uppishly to deep square
length on off stump, tapped to long-on off the back foot
shot. Slower ball at a length on off stump, shuffles and looks to square. Doesn't get it between square and fine, but it's wide enough to deep midwicket's left to beat him for the boundary
yorker just outside off. Jammed into the covers

yorker just outside off. Shuffles and drops it pitch side into the leg side. Calls for yet another run that isn't there. Neser rotates and throws and misses. Would have been out at the non-striker's end
slower ball, full on leg stump. Flicked to short fine's left
bouncer just outside off. Beaten on the upper cut
short and wide outside off, cut to deep point
short and just outside off. Cut to sweeper's left
floated full on middle stump, swept to deep midwicket
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
googly, short of a length outside off. Chopped to short third
huge! What a hit from Ross. Googly, lobbed up at off stump. Gets the front leg down and nails the slog sweep to send it over the square leg boundary
slower ball at a length on off stump, defended off the front foot
full on leg stump, flicked. Tremendous bat speed on that. Deep square can't get it to his left
slower ball at a length on leg stump. Closes the face too early on the flick. Chips it behind short fine
short of a length on leg stump, looks to pull, cops it on the thigh
slower ball at a length on leg stump, tapped to deep midwicket
yorker just outside off. Jammed into the covers
slower ball, full toss outside off. Clubbed along the floor to deep midwicket
short ball up at leg stump. Rides the bounce and dabs it down into the short fine area

that's the win! What a glorious hit to bring that up. Length ball, slower one, just outside off. Skids on nicely to the bat. He gets the front leg out of the way and clatters this straight and flat over the bowler
